trans-unit.source: Versatile news system for TYPO3.
trans-unit.target: Vielseitiges Nachrichtensystem für TYPO3.

trans-unit.source: "News" items are typically those which goes on your frontpage on the websites and allows you to link down to a page with the full story (the "single view"). They may also represent links to internal pages in the system or links to external pages.
trans-unit.target: Normalerweise werden "Nachrichten" auf der Startseite der Web-Site angezeigt und sind mit einem Link auf den Volltext der Meldung versehen. Sie können aber auch Links zu anderen Artikeln (Seiten innerhalb der Web-Site) darstellen.

trans-unit.source: tt_news_cat,tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/
trans-unit.target: tt_news_cat, tt_news-Anleitung | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/

trans-unit.source: Enter a headline for the tt_news db-record.
trans-unit.target: Eine Überschrift für den Artikel eingeben.

trans-unit.source: The value inserted here will substitute the marker ###NEWS_TITLE### in the html template. If "substitutePageTitle" is enabled in TS setup the title of the page with the single view on it will be set to the title of the news article (the title of the indexed search result will also show the title of the news article).
trans-unit.target: Der hier eingefügte Wert ersetzt den Marker ###NEWS_TITLE### in der HTML-Vorlage. Falls "substitutePageTitle" im TS Template aktiviert ist, wird der Seitentitel der Seite mit der News-Detailansicht den Titel der Newsmitteilung tragen (indexed_search wird ebenfalls den Titel der Newsmitteilung als Seitentitel anzeigen).

trans-unit.source: Here you can define the "type" of the newsitem (normal news article, link to internal page, link to external page).
trans-unit.target: Hier kann der Typ des Datensatzes festgelegt werden (normaler Artikel, Link auf interne Seite, Link auf externe Seite).

trans-unit.source: Possible types are: - News: This type is used for normal news articles. Only these news will have a link to a SINGLE view. - Link External page: These news records are only showing in list views (= LIST and LATEST). The links from these news records will point directly to the URL which is configured in the field "External URL". - Link internal page: This news records are also showing only in lists (list, latest, search). The target for these links is configured globally in the Constant editor (advanced->target for internal links).
Use this to temporarily exclude this tt_news db-record from display.
trans-unit.target: Diese Option verwenden, um den Artikel temporär von der Anzeige auszuschließen.

trans-unit.source: Setting this option is practical while editing a new tt_news db-record. When it is set, the newsitem will not be displayed unless you - if you're logged in as backend user - enable the Admin Panel>Preview>Show hidden records option.
tt_news:starttime,tt_news:endtime,tt_news:fe_group
trans-unit.target: tt_news:starttime,tt_news:endtime,tt_news:fe_group

trans-unit.source: The "Start" time determines the date from which the tt_news db-record will be available online.
trans-unit.target: Die "Start"-Zeit bestimmt das Datum, von dem an der tt_news-Datensatz online verfügbar sein wird.

trans-unit.source: tt_news:endtime,tt_news:hidden,tt_news:fe_group
trans-unit.target: tt_news:endtime,tt_news:hidden,tt_news:fe_group

trans-unit.source: The "End" time determines the date from which the tt_news db-record will NOT be available online anymore.
trans-unit.target: Die "Stopp"-Zeit bestimmt das Datum, von dem an der tt_news-Datensatz nicht mehr online verfügbar sein wird.

trans-unit.source: tt_news:starttime,tt_news:hidden,tt_news:fe_group
trans-unit.target: tt_news:starttime,tt_news:hidden,tt_news:fe_group

trans-unit.source: If this is enabled non-admin users can't open the record anymore.
trans-unit.target: Ist diese Option aktiviert, können Benutzer ohne Administratorstatus den Datensatz nicht mehr bearbeiten.

trans-unit.source: pages:editlock
trans-unit.target: pages:editlock

trans-unit.source: If "Access" is set to a usergroup name, only website users which are members of the selected usergroup will be able to view the news article when they are logged in. The special option "Hide at login" means the news article will <em>not</em> be visible for website users that are logged in. Likewise "Show at login" will make the news article visible for any logged in frontend user.
tt_news:starttime,tt_news:endtime,tt_news:hidden
trans-unit.target: tt_news:starttime,tt_news:endtime,tt_news:hidden

trans-unit.source: The value entered here will be shown as date and/or time in news articles.
trans-unit.target: Der hier eingegebene Wert wird als Datum und/oder Zeit im Nachrichtenartikel angezeigt.

trans-unit.source:
The value of this field affects several things:
- newsitems in lists and in the archivemenu are ordered by this field by default. - if a value for "datetimeDaysToArchive" is set, this value is added to the value of the datetime field and handled as archivedate. (see section "The archive" in the tt_news manual) - the value of these field is taken for the html-template markers ###NEWS_DATE###, ###NEWS_TIME### and ###NEWS_AGE###. (all parsed through the stdWrap function "strftime") For new created records the current time is automatically inserted as datetime.
tt_news:archivedate
trans-unit.target: tt_news:archivedate

trans-unit.source: The date entered in this field will determine if news are handled as "archived" or not.
trans-unit.target: Das hier angegebene Datum legt fest, ob der Artikel als archiviert angesehen wird oder nicht.

trans-unit.source: If archivedate shows a value in the past, the news record will be shown in lists showing only archived news. Of course it will disappear from lists showing only non-archived news.
tt_news:datetime
trans-unit.target: tt_news:datetime

trans-unit.source: The language of the news record.
trans-unit.target: Die Sprache, in der der Artikel verfasst ist.

trans-unit.source: This should be the default language unless this record is a translation of another record.
trans-unit.target: Dies sollte die Standardsprache sein, es sei denn, bei dem Artikel handelte es sich um die Übersetzung eines anderen.

trans-unit.source: tt_content:sys_language_uid,pages:sys_language_uid,pages_language_overlay:sys_language_uid
trans-unit.target: tt_content:sys_language_uid,pages:sys_language_uid,pages_language_overlay:sys_language_uid

trans-unit.source: The news record in the default language where the current record is a translation from.
trans-unit.target: Der in der Standardsprache verfasste Artikel, dessen Übersetzung dieser Artikel ist.

trans-unit.source: You should not change this field manually because it is handled by the TYPO3 localization system.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Feld sollte nicht von Hand geändert werden, da es vom TYPO3-Lokalisierungssystem verwendet wird.

trans-unit.source: The author of the news record.
trans-unit.target: Der Verfasser des Artikels.

trans-unit.source: The value of this field will substitute the html-template marker ###NEWS_AUTHOR###. In the default TS setup the author name will be linked to the author's email address.
tt_news:email
trans-unit.target: tt_news:email

trans-unit.source: The versioning label of this record.
trans-unit.target: Die Versionskennzeichnung des Artikels.

trans-unit.source: You can edit this field in the versioning module or in the workspaces module. This field appears only if it has a value.
trans-unit.target: Sie können dieses Feld im Versionierungsmodul oder im Arbeitsumgebungsmodul bearbeiten. Dieses Feld erscheint nur, wenn es einen Wert hat.

trans-unit.source: The email address of the news author.
trans-unit.target: Die E-Mail-Adresse des Verfassers des Artikels.

trans-unit.source: In the default TS setup the value of this field will be taken as typolink parameter for the author name (if it is a valid email address). The value of this field will substitute the html-template marker ###NEWS_EMAIL###.
tt_news:email
trans-unit.target: tt_news:email

trans-unit.source: A short teaser text for the news article.
trans-unit.target: Ein kurzer Antext für den Artikel.

trans-unit.source: The value of this field will substitute the html-template marker ###NEWS_SUBHEADER###. If this field is empty the value of the field "Text" is taken instead. The conten of subheader is also written to a TypoScript register ("newsSubheader") which can be used to insert the subheader as "<meta> description" to the page header (plugin "metatags" required)
tt_news:bodytext,tt_news:keywords,section "Registers" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/
This is the main text for the news article.
trans-unit.target: Der eigentliche Text des Artikels.

trans-unit.source:
With the type "news" the Rich Text editor (RTE) is used for editing this field (if your browser supports it and a RTE is generally enabled in the system). Be aware that the content is "cleaned" before it goes into the database. The content of this field will substite the html-template marker ###NEWS_CONTENT###.
In the news "single view" the content of the field "Text" can be divided to multiple pages with a pagebrowser.
trans-unit.target: Beim Datensatztyp "Artikel" wird der Rich-Text-Editor (RTE) zum Bearbeiten des Feldes verwendet (sofern dies vom Browser unterstützt wird und im System aktiviert ist). Beachten Sie, dass der Inhalt vor dem Speichern in der Datenbank "gesäubert" wird. Der Inhalt dieses Feldes wird an Stelle der Vorlagenmarkierung ###NEWS_CONTENT### dargestellt. In der Einzelansicht kann der Inhalt dieses Feldes auf mehrere Seiten aufgeteilt werden, auf die über eine Seitennavigation zugegriffen werden kann.

trans-unit.source: section "the Rich-Text-editor" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/,section "The SINGLE view" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/,tt_news:no_auto_pb
Here you can enter some keywords that will be inserted as <meta> keywords in the page header (plugin "metatags" required).
trans-unit.target: Hier können Sie einige Stichwörter eingeben, die als <meta>-Stichwörter im Kopf der Seite eingefügt werden (Plug-In "metatags" wird benötigt).

trans-unit.source: The content of this field is written to a TypoScript register ("newsKeywords") which can be used to insert the keywords as "<meta> keywords" to the page header (plugin "metatags" required). If you don't need this field for "<meta> keywords" you can use it as a second "subheader" field (it will substitute the template marker ###NEWS_KEYWORDS###).
tt_news:short,section "Registers" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/
Here you can disable "automatic pagebreaks" for this record.
trans-unit.target: Hier können Sie den automatischen Seitenumbruch für diesen Datensatz deaktivieren.

trans-unit.source: Pagebreaks can be inserted automatically in the single view (if a value for "maxWordsInSIngleView" is set in TS setup). If this is not wanted for the current news article you can disable it here.
tt_news:bodytext,section "The SINGLE view" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/
Here you can assign categories to the current news record (if this record is no translation of another record).
trans-unit.target: Hier können Sie Kategorien für den aktuellen Nachrichtensatz zuordnen (falls dieser Datensatz keine Übersetzung eines anderen Datensatzes ist).

trans-unit.source: You can assign categories to news records that are not translations of other records. That allows you to select newsitems for display by their assigned categories or subcategories. A tt_news record can be member of multiple categories. If the current record is a translation (if it has a "translation original" and a non-default syslanguage) the categories are not editable, they will only be listed in the tt_news form. Categories can have parent categories. F.e the category "FrontEnd plugins" in the screenshot below does have category "Extensions" selected as "parent category", so "FrontEnd plugins" is a subcategory of "Extensions". That has the result, that the record in this example which has category "FrontEnd plugins" will also appear in a list that shows only category "Extensions". The titles of the assigned categories will substite the html-template marker ###NEWS_CATEGORY###, the category images will be written to the marker ###NEWS_CATEGORY_IMAGE###. Note: The use of subcategories has to be enabled in the TypoScript setup: plugin.tt_news.useSubCategories = 1 Controlling editing permissions with assigned categories: It's possible to control the editing permissions of news records with the assigned categories. If this feature is enabled a BE user can only change news records that have categories assigned that are defined in the list of allowed categories for this BE-user. If a BE-user performs any action (move,delete,hide,localize,copy,version,modify) with a record that has non-allowed categories assigned an error message will be displayed and the action will be ignored. Another message will be displayed in the news record above the fields "Title" and "Category". Non-selectable categories will be displayed in grey text and not linked. See second screenshot below. The size of both fields for the category selection can be configured in the extension manager.
EXT:tt_news/csh/tt_news_categoy.png,EXT:tt_news/csh/tt_news_categoy_msg.png
the field "Category" in the tt_news db-record. If a BE-user opens a record that has non-allowed categories assigned this message will be displayed.
tt_news_cat:parent_category,section "Categories" from tt_news manual | http://typo3.org/documentation/document-library/tt_news/
Here you can assign images that will be shown in the news record.
trans-unit.target: Hier können dem Artikel Bilder zugewiesen werden.

trans-unit.source: All assigned images will be rendered to the template marker ###NEWS_IMAGE###. The images will be uploaded/copied to the folder uploads/pics/. The amount of images that are shown in a certain view (single,list,latest) can be controlled with the TS property "imageCount".
trans-unit.target: Alle zugewiesenen Bilder werden an Stelle der Vorlagenmarkierung ###NEWS_IMAGE### ausgegeben. Die Bilder werden in den Ordner uploads/pics/ hochgeladen. Die Anzahl Bilder, die in einer Ansicht (single, list, latest) dargestellt wird, kann über die TS-Eigenschaft "imageCount" festgelegt werden.

trans-unit.source: The caption which is shown under the image(s).
trans-unit.target: Die Bildbeschreibung unterhalb des Bildes.

trans-unit.source: The field will be split by linebreaks.
trans-unit.target: Bei mehreren Bildern wird jeweils eine Zeile Text bis zum Zeilenumbruch einem Bild zugeordnet.

trans-unit.source: tt_news:image
trans-unit.target: tt_news:email

trans-unit.source: The text entered here will be inserted as "alt" attribure of the image HTML-tag.
trans-unit.target: Hier eingetragener Text wird für das Attribut "alt" des HTML-Tags des Bilds verwendet.

trans-unit.source: The field will be split by linebreaks.
trans-unit.target: Bei mehreren Bildern wird jeweils eine Zeile Text bis zum Zeilenumbruch einem Bild zugeordnet.

trans-unit.source: tt_news:imagetitletext,tt_news:image
The text entered here will be inserted as "title" attribure of the image HTML-tag.
trans-unit.target: Hier eingetragener Text wird für das Attribut "title" des HTML-Tags des Bilds verwendet.

trans-unit.source: The field will be split by linebreaks.
trans-unit.target: Bei mehreren Bildern wird jeweils eine Zeile Text bis zum Zeilenumbruch einem Bild zugeordnet.

trans-unit.source: tt_news:imagealttext,tt_news:image
The links that are inserted here will be displayed under the "bodytext" in the news single view.
trans-unit.target: Hier eingetragenen Links werden unterhalb des Artikeltextes dargestellt.

trans-unit.source: This field is parsed through the stdWrap function "parseFunc" so it will be possible to enter links as typolink. F.e.: <LINK http://typo3.org _blank>open typo3.org</LINK>
trans-unit.target: Dieses Feld wird mit der stdWrap-Funktion "parseFunc" analysiert. Daher ist es möglich Links als Typolinks einzugeben. Z.B. <LINKhttp://typo3.org _blank>open typo3.org</LINK>

trans-unit.source: Related news articles or pages.
trans-unit.target: Mit dem Artikel verwandte Artikel oder Seiten.

trans-unit.source:
In this field you can select news records or pages that will be displayed as related news. Related news with type "news" will point to the single view of the related news item. Related news with type "External URL" or "internal Link" will point to the url or page id that is inserted in the newsrecord. Related pages will be handled as news with type link to internal pages.
tt_news can be configured to insert the link which points back from the related record to this record automatically. To enable this "bi-directional relations" set "useBidirectionalRelations" to 1 in the constant editor or by TS.
Here you can attach files to a news record.
trans-unit.target: Hier können dem Artikel Dateien zugeordnet werden.

trans-unit.source: The atached files will be rendered through the stdWrap function "filelink". See default TS setup for an example.
trans-unit.target: Die zugeordneten Dateien werden über die stdWrap-Funktion "filelink" dargestellt. Beispiel siehe die Standard-TS-Konfiguration.
